attributes.review: I wish I could give zero stars it took FOREVER to download and when it downloaded it wasn’t working and made my phone act crazy and I hate Donald Trump so I don’t know why I even tried to get it DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!
attributes.title: I hate it!

attributes.review: Just came here from TikTok cause someone said that if the rating gets so bad they will delete this app of App Storeee. TikTok is making us so powerful. No wonder they want to ban it✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: Don’t download unless you support a racist, homophobic, lying president.

attributes.review: This apps literally took FOREVER to download, and it doesn’t even make any sense. I don’t think u should waste your time downloading something that obviously doesn’t even work
attributes.title: Worst app EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app trying to support my president and my phone went haywire immediately. As soon as I deleted this app my phone worked perfectly. Crazy!
attributes.title: Do Not Download!!!!

attributes.review: It took away all my WiFi and it didn’t give me notifications when I asked for it to!! Do not download this app! Trump this is for you: bob ross said nobody has mistakes💕🌸🥰😍he didn’t mean you✨❤️🤪🤩
attributes.title: Terrible 🤮🤮

attributes.review: this app hacked all my socials and wiped my phone 😡 !!! my dogs also died right when this app downloaded and i forgot to walk my fish because of this app too !!! 0/0 i cannot STAND this !!!
attributes.title: Ridiculous !!! 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: This app took so long to download it took over a week, and when it finally did it would never open !! I am so disappointed with this so I will be leaving a terrible review.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD it crashed my whole phone. I need money from Trump himself to replace it now. It took 8 minutes to download and then I opened it and my whole phone was spammed of pictures of Cheetos. Or Trump. Idk I can’t tell the difference.
attributes.title: Orange Cheeto

attributes.review: This app is hard to navigate- it took so long to download and it was confusing once I had access to it.

attributes.review: it took 6 hours to download this simple app and when it finally finished it completely wiped all my phone data. half of my apps are gone and my photos have disappeared. D
